info.title: Custom QR Code
info.description:
Our WebService API lets you create QR Code inside your own system of information (application, industrial platform, website..).
It is a solution for computer developpers that grants them the possibility to create QR Codes inside their own mechanism

get.description: The "data" parameter describes the content of the QR Code, while the "setting" parameter describes its design. Both are documented here: https://github.com/unitag/QRCODES-API/blob/master/documentation.md

parameters.name: data
parameters.description: Content of the generated QR Code, documented here: https://github.com/unitag/QRCODES-API/blob/master/documentation.md#data-object

parameters.name: setting
parameters.description: Design of the generated QR Code, documented here: Content of the QR Code, documented here: https://github.com/unitag/QRCODES-API/blob/master/documentation.md#setting-object

parameters.name: size
parameters.description: Size of the output image in pixels (up to 3000, 400 by default). Warning: the parameter must be named SIZE (uppercase), although Mashape appears to force lowercase.

parameters.name: t
parameters.description: Format of the output image: PNG (default), JPEG, SVG or PDF.  Warning: the parameter must be named T (uppercase), although Mashape appears to force lowercase.
